info.title: Restricted Switch

switch.restricted.name: switch.restricted
switch.restricted.description: This Resource describes a switch(on/off) restricting UPDATE for 'on'. The Property "state" is a Boolean. A state of True means that the switch is turned on. A state of False means that the switch is turned off.

state.description: The status of the restricted switch.
